channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump officials say second strike aimed to destroy drug boat instead of crew
item.description: Officials hew closely to secret memo which gives legal cover to firing on boats even if it would kill people on board Trump administration officials h...

item.title: Whistleblower accuses Foreign Office of ‘censoring’ warning of Sudan genocide
item.description: Exclusive: Analyst claims UK officials deleted alert to threat of genocidal violence by paramilitaries to protect UAE Warnings of a possible “genocide...

item.title: ‘Obvious’ Putin does not want peace in Ukraine, say Nato ministers, as Russia denies rejecting US plan - Europe live
item.description: Kremlin says Putin did not reject US peace plan but found some parts of the deal ‘unacceptable’ We also got more reactions from the Kremlin this morni...

item.title: Starmer faces Badenoch at PMQs as Farage denies election pact with Tories – UK politics live
item.description: Reform UK leader says report of an election deal with Conservatives is ‘false’, but suggests only under their current leadership This is from Ed Davey...

item.title: Donald Trump calls Somali immigrants ‘garbage’ as ICE operations reportedly planned in Minnesota - US politics live
item.description: President yesterday also halted immigration for people from 19 nations including Somalia, Afghanistan and Yemen Trump had threatened the dramatic crac...

item.title: Salford Red Devils wound up by High Court over debts
item.description: Troubled former Super League club Salford Red Devils are wound up by the High Court.

item.title: William and Catherine greet German president on first state visit in 27 years
item.description: Germany's president will receive a ceremonial welcome from the King and a state banquet in Windsor Castle.

item.title: Success in 2025 - are the Lionesses ready for 2026?
item.description: England cap off a successful 2025 with two resounding victories over China and Ghana at home - so what shape are they in for World Cup qualification?

item.title: Nursery worker admits sexually abusing children
item.description: Vincent Chan, 45, admits multiple offences including assault by penetration.

item.title: 'Only win will do in biggest Test of Bazball era'
item.description: England cannot mathematically lose the Ashes in Brisbane, but a 2-0 deficit would mean the urn is as good as gone - this is the biggest Test of the Ba...
